choices: First option : Zara finds some tinies (before JW events)
Second option : Zara survived JW and wants some revenge
Third Option : Zara had a shrink ray (before JW events)
1.content: First of all, what is your choice ?
1.title: Beginning

choices: She steps on the bugs
She decides to check what they look like
Other choice
11.content:
Zara Young always was a busy woman. Being the assistant of the woman who leads the most
famous Park in the world was not easy everyday...That's why this week was special. She was
in vacation, and it was the first time since Zara got this job, 2 years ago.

Now she was wondering what to do as she was sitting on a bench, in a Park. She had more time for her
boyfriend, but he couldn't have any vacations...Zara couldn't blame him, she was not the best personn
for that, after all he always supported her and was really patient.

But now she felt lonely and borded, as she decided to walk a little in the park, eating an ice cream.
The weather was hot. Zara wore a simple dress, and some heels, trying to appreciate her day, althought
that it was difficult without her boyfriend. She would prefer to work right now, but her boss didn't need her.

After some minutes of walking, something got her attention in the grass, at her feet. She heard some weird noises and
blades grass were moving strangely.

" I wonder what kind of bugs is that..." She thought.

Zara realized that having some interest for bugs, meant a lot about how boring was her day. She got
frustrated at this thought.

Then...
11.title: First option : Zara finds some tinies before JW...

choices: Grabs one of them
Follow them
Other choice
112.content:
Zara then bends down, holding her ice cream in one hand, and using the other to move
the grass and see the bugs. The noises became stronger and stronger, until she could
finally see them...And they were not bugs. In fact, she couldn't believe what she was
seeing for some seconds.

" That's impossible...." She thought.

So she then removed her sunglasses, to have a better look at 4 tinies men, who were looking at
her screaming some inaudible things. It was obvious they were scared, but no one tried to move.

" What are you ?! " Zara finally said.

As no one replied, Zara took her smartphone from her handbag and pointed it at them to take
a picture, but at the same moment they felt threatened and started to run in different directions

" Hey come back ! "

Zara didn't want to loose this opportunity : they were human, they were real, and they were tiny...
She couldn't let them go just like that. She was curious, and excited about their existence.

She then...
112.title: She decides to check what they look like

choices: Put the tiny guy in her ice cream
Put the tiny guy in her handbag, time to go home
Try to look for the other tinies
1121.content:
Zara quickly grabbed the closer tiny man running away from her, with the hand
holding her ice cream. He was struggling, but it was useless. He was pressed
between her thumb and the waffle cone.
With her other hand holding her smartphone, she finally could take a picture of
that poor little thing begging her to let him go.

Zara then realized that it was the first time someone was begging her. It was a
good feeling somehow to know that someone had some consideration of her, beside
her boyfriend.

She then decided to...
1121.title: Grabs one of them

choices: Zara keep eating her ice cream with him inside
She let him out before he dies
other choice
11211.content:
Zara was not a mean personn, maybe it was even the opposite.
Her boyfriend always told her that she was too kind and discreet with
people, and that's why she was "used" by her boss, or her friends.
But this time, she had the possibility to impose her will to someone, this
time she could do whatever she wants to someone.

And on this very moment, she wanted to make an experiment with the
tiny man, by putting him into her ice cream ball. So she put her
smarthone back in her handbag, then picked him by the head between
her thumb and forefinger, and placed him deep inside the ball savor
strawberry. His whole body was now stuck inside, and only his head
was out the ball.

The tiny man could do nothing but screaming of pain, as the cream
was freezing his body, it was unbearable for him, he was struggling
like crazy and screamed so much that Zara was worried that someone
heard him. She was checking around her, there were no one. She
was relieved.

What's next ?
11211.title: Put the tiny guy in her ice cream

choices: Zara wants more tiny people
Zara's cute twin daughter shows up
112111.content:
Seeing the coast was clear, Zara continued to eat her ice cream. Even at the tiny mans current size, he was so small, you would have to be in complete dead silence to actually hear the pathetic wails of a human the size of an ant. Still, Zara didn't want to take any chances. She adjusted her big goofy looking shades as she prepared to end this wonderful little event. And this mans life.
With one big swipe of her tongue, Zara licked up the bug sized man along with a huge mound of vanilla ice cream!

"Mmmmm....." Zara moaned as she swallowed. The man was now a total goner!

"Rot in my stomach acid. I'll be sure to say something on your behalf when I actually give a crap. Speaking of crap, I will see whatever is left of you in a few hours..." Zara said laughing evily.
112111.title: Mmmmm.....

choices: she places them somewhere on her body
torture one of them and make the other watch
1121111.content:
Zara decided she needed to find more people. She loved the feeling to be a giant to someone. She didn't care at all about what they were, all mattered was that they were small. So small that they couldn't do anything against her. She looked down at the grass by her feet, and spotted two little human form running away, a boy and probably his mother. Zara started to think that maybe that guy she just ate was certainly the man of the family, husband of the woman and father of the boy. She couldn't help but smile at this possibility.

" Oh well, let's see what can i do with you "
1121111.title: Zara wants more tiny people

choices: She forces the tiny to rub her feet
She has a talk with him
11212.content:
Zara then decided to keep him, and put her tiny prisonner in her handbag.
She tried to imagine differents things she could do with him, and she smiled.
But a part of her told her that she should let him go...maybe because he looked
like a human being. But she convinced herself that he was not. No one knew about
the existence of these "tiny people", so they had no right. And they will miss no
one. This was not a kidnapping, it was the law of the strongest. Nothing more.

Zara started to walk away to go home. She walked fast, making sure to avoid
people as much as possible, as she could hear her prisonner screaming from
the inside of her handbag. She tried to be natural, and finished to eat her ice
cream.

Once she left the park, she felt better as he stopped to scream, but she stills
needed to get home as fast as she could.

After some minutes, she finally entered her apartment. Zara put her handbag on the
couch, and she sat beside it, removing her heels. She started to rub her feet
with her hands. Walking so fast with these heel, had made her feet hurt...
11212.title: Time to go home

choices: Place her foot on the village
Messing with them in differents ways
11213.content:
Keeping him in one hand with the waffle cone, Zara decided to look for the
other tinies. They couldn't be so far...She was looking at the grass, moving in
different spots, but it seemed that they were trying to follow only one direction.

She choose to wait...After all, they probably came from somewhere, and Zara wanted
find more of them. So she kept eating her ice cream cone, ignoring the guy she was
holding with it, and kept a look the grass. After some minutes, she noticed that they
stopped to move near a bush. Now it was time to check, wondering how many of
them she will find. Zara kneeled at the bush, and removes several leaves, revealing
an hidden place....She heard many screams from the place as they realized they were
discovered...It was an whole village ! From what she could see, they were about 50
tinies people !

" Awesome " Zara said loudly, expressing her own enjoyement. The tinies started
to run like crazy, trying to hide somewhere. By seeing this, Zara's first instinct
was to...
11213.title: Tiny village discovered

choices: a group of tinies attacks her
She keeps some survivors for herself
112131.content:
They were running everywhere, for Zara it was funny to see. They were like ants to her...
She then decided to place her foot in the small village while still licking her ice cream.
The giant foot landed on a house, crushing it without mercy, and many of the tinies
around fell on the ground because of the shock. They were now looking at a huge
foot wearing heels. They realized that she could crush them in the next second if
she wanted to, so they didn't know if they had to move or not.

Zara was enjoying this. She could do wathever she wanted with them. She was a
giant for them, she was a God. In this very moment, nothing else mattered for her,
there were no park, no normal people around, only her and the tinies men.

One of the them who who fell then decided he couldn't stay here, and started to run.
Zara noticed him and wanted to know how it feels like to crush a man under her foot.
So she moved the front part of her foot, keeping her heel on the ground, and turned it
to the tiny one running away...Then she lowered the toes part on him. He screamed
a phew second before he was pressed into the dirty ground, and she twisted her foot.
Zara looked at the mess she just created, and saw a bloodstain mixed with
the ground...it was disgusting. She smiled. Her ice cream was really delicious.

The tinies were screaming and crying everywhere, some could get away and were hiding
in the grass. They knew that from her size, she wouldn't see them. But they were so many
people left around her foot, so Zara took her time to step on them one by one, destroying also
many houses on her way.

Then...
112131.title: Place her foot on the village

choices: Continue
12.content:
The whole park was in darkness as the night has fall. Zara was walking slowly, seriously injuried, and
traumatized by what she had to endure....only because she wanted to protect Zach and Gray, her boss's nephews,
she had to suffer from an attack of Pteranodons, just before being swallowed alive by the Mosasaur in the pool.

Zara, never liked Jurassic World and the worst of all, was that she wasnt supposed to be here this month. But Claire, her
boss refused to give her the vacations she deserved, pretending that it was not the best time. So Zara remained professionnal,
and waited quietly for the end of the week to finally have some vacations.
Thank God after several minutes in the Mosa's stomach, the dinosaurs vomited her and she could manage to escape the pool
before it changes it's mind an decide to eat her again.

" Why did this happen to me ?! What did i do wrong ?"

She repeated the same question in her mind, again and again, giving her a strong hatred to the people who never cared
about her. This event changed her forever...

But now her main problem was that she was alone, and now walking into the Center of Jurassic World, so she could call someone.
She didnt fear any dinosaurs anymore now, or at least, she didn't fear the dinosaurs who can KILL her easily, the dinosaurs who would
not miss their prey...

On the same moment, she heard a grunt...a little grunt by her feet...It was a dinosaur. A really tiny dinosaur. Zara never seen a specie as small as this one. It looked like a raptor, but she wasn't sure. It tried to bite her barefoot covered of blood because of her wounds.
Zara just kicked it.

" Get away from me ! "

The raptor fell back on the ground, and Zara didn't hesitate to crush it with her foot, and twisted it on the ground.

Then she heard someone behind her :

"Oh God, are you ok ? Are your a survivor ?! "

A man was here, holding a strange gun in his hand, and wear a kind of scientist coat. Zara looked at him.

" I've been living a bad day..." She only answered.

" I see. My name is Doctor Hamilton, don't worry, i came with many soldiers. You are safe now. Let me help heal, come with
me in my lab please."
12.title: Zara survived

choices: Convince him to test the Growth ray on her
Take the gun and shrinks Hamilton
121.content:
After Hamilton treated her wounds, Zara spotted some tiny species of dinosaurs, in a on his desk.

" Why are they...So small ? " She asked.

" Oh...this is why i'm here. I made a gun which can grow or shrink everything alive. So after the incident in the park, i've
been sent to test it on the dinosaurs. And it's a success. But of course, i won't try to use the "growth" button. We don't
want any giant dinosaurs, right ? haha "

Zara seemed interested by this "weapon". Hamilton focused only on shrinking some dinosaurs, but Zara could see more potential in it.

" Does it work on human also ? "

" It probably work on human, yes. But we never tested it on anyone,"

Zara was thinking...
121.title: Continue

choices: Zara becomes a giant !
1211.content:
Zara tried to imagine herself as a giant...How amazing it could be. Well that was only if the gun work on
humans, but Dr Hamilton seemed to be confident with that. She then thought about something...Something
that could convince him to use the gun on her.

" You said you came with soldiers ? I guess they have to capture or kills the dinosaurs, or something like
that right ? "

" Indeed " he replied.

" And what about the big dinosaur in the pool ? How do they plan to kill him ? " She asked.

" that's...a good question. But as the Mosasaurus is trapped in the pool, i guess they don't have to worry about it "

" To be honest...For some personnal reason, i want this creature to be dead. So you could test the "growth" button on
me. This way i could kill it. Even if it's trapped in the pool, who know what could happen in the future ? i think it's safer to
destroy it right now. " Zara said.

" I don't know...I need to ask to the Captain who leads this mission...."

" He is not here for now. And i really need my revenge on this thing...please. I will be quick ! "

Dr Hamilton knew by seeing Zara that she probably suffered earlier on the day. And she was determined to kill the
Mosasaur by herself...He was 9also9% sure that the gun work on humans. The only problem was that he was not allowed to test
it on someone..But she said she will be quick, so Hamilton was ready to take the responsibility of it. Maybe this poor woman
will feel better after having her revenge on the Mosa....
1211.title: Convince him to test the Growth ray on her

choices: She feeds the Mosasaur with them
Let's ignore them...for now
12111.content:
" We should go outside so you won't destroy the building in the growth process "

Zara followed him, then Hamilton pointed the gun at her and pushed the growth button. The process was
shorter than expected, but at least it worked ! Zara became a giant in less than a minutes, and Hamilton
was standing in front of her dirty barefeet.It was intimidating.

Zara was now looking at the small buildings around her. The highest one reaching her knee.It was just amazing !
She was enought huge to kill the Mosasaur now, but first she needed to solve something : Hamilton. He was the
one with the gun. She then carefully picked him up in her giant hand to bring him to her face level.

" What are you doing ? Could you put me down please ? I have vertigo ! " He asked, scared.

Zara just smiled at him.

" I prefer to have you with me...So i'm sure you won't shrink me unless i'm asking you to "

" Wait what do you mean ?! "

" relax, i just want to have fun for now, so enjoy the view ! "

Then she put him in her shirt front pocket, and started to walk. She imagined the soldiers in the forest, hearing her footsteps...They would
think about a huge dinosaur. She giggled at the idea. After a few seconds walking, she could see the pool...Where this thing swimming inside, changed her conception about life...Eat or be eaten. That was the only rule for Zara now.

As she got closer the pool, several men were around, looking at the giant woman ! They were about ten soldiers, wondering what was happenning. Zara smiled at them.
12111.title: Zara becomes a giant !

choices: She begins to rampage through the city
She lets her new pet roam around the city while she watches
121111.content: Zara reached down grabbing all ten of the tiny soldiers and the Monasuar in both hands dangling the screaming troops over the creature's razor sharp filled maw "Ahhhhhhhhh!" They screamed "Please let us go!" But laughing evilly the giantess refused "No how about a quick snack my little pretty polysuar? Ten yummy little men in their army uniforms all in a row!" She sang merrily dangling them further one of them was close to peeing on himself he was so terrified she ignored their feeble pleas"Where one goes the others follow...okay that didn't rhyme but I never was a great poet anyway here you go my pet...." As one by one she dropped the screaming men into the creature's mouth until none were left the creature let out a sort of belching sound as she put it down "Good boy now it's time for me to have some fun but what shall I do first...."
121111.title: She feeds the Mosasaur with them

choices: Go to Claire's office
The soldiers are coming
Reader choice
1212.content:
Zara was looking at the gun on the desk...what if it worked on human ? This gun
could change her life forever...Being the one in control of everything, enslaving
the people who never shown any sign of consideration for her. She wanted to
taste this feeling for the first time in her life.

So she made her decision, and suddenly took the gun from desk, and before Hamilton
had time to realize what's happenning, she shot at him, and in the next seconds he found
himself shrunk at a tiny size, just the same proportion of the raptor she crushed earlier.

" What's the ??? Why did you do that ?! " he screamed.

" You were right, it works." She replie, looking at the small guy standing at her feet.

" Yes...it works...Now please give grow me back ! There's a button on the side, you..."

" I can't do that. Sorry. I need this gun, so i'm taking it. " Zara said.

" you won't get away with this !! I came with many soldiers, they will come back soon or
later ! " Hamilton tried to reason with her.

" This is my problem now, not yours."

Zara bend down over him and picked him in her hand, For Hamilton, it was an horrific experience, being
in the hand someone because she used his own creation on him. She hold him tight, Her ring on on her
finger was hurting his back.
For Zara, this feeling was good. The feeling to have someone at her mercy, trying to get away but it was
useless, and he couldn't do nothing but wait for his fate. She had to live this feeling too with the Pteranodon,
then the Mosasaur. And now she had the full control of her life, and the life of this tiny guy who didn't ask anything,
just like her.

" You're coming with me." She only said. Then she put in the front pocket of her shirt.

" Now the first thing i need to do, is to find some shoes. I'm sure i could find some heels in Claire's office. I will also take my time
to check where her nephews are living. They need to be punished. Everything was because of them. "
1212.title: Take the gun and shrinks Hamilton

choices: Claire was here with some soldiers !
No one inside, let's continue
12121.content:
Hamilton could do nothing but stay in her pocket as she was walking to her boss's
office. Zara hoped to not meet any soldiers on her way, otherwise she would have
to shrink them, and they wouldn't deserve this. She had many respect for soldiers,
but if she had to, then too bad for them. Zara was now the best personn to say that
life can easily be taken by something stronger at anytime. We can fight it, but not avoid
what has to happen anyway.

After some minutes, she finally reached Claire's office. She openned the door...
12121.title: Go to Claire's office

choices: She forces Claire to have some fun with the soldiers
Now she is the boss, and Claire will be her assistant (or slave)
Reader choice
121211.content:
As soon as she entered the office, Zara was in shock to face Claire her boss with two soldiers !

" Zara ?!! Where were you !!! " Claire asked, almost angrily. That only made Zara feeling more hatred for her.

One of the soldier asked Claire : " Who is she ? "

" She...is my assistant, it's ok "

" So your nephews didn't tell you anything, right ? Of course they didn't, i'm not so important...I was just a thing you
could use for looking after them, instead of letting me having my vacations with my boyfriend. After everything i've
done for you, but who cares about me and my feelings ?! " Zara said, in a rude tone. But she had more reason to be
angry than Claire.

" Wait wait, i don't understand...What happenned ? I can see you've been attacked by some dinosaurs...I'm sorry i thought
you just left the island when the mess started in the park. I was angry you left my nephews. "

" Always your nephews..Why did you come back if you care about them ?! "

" I had no choice, we couldn't let the island like this...Some they forced me to come back and check the equipement.
I came with a scientist Dr Hamilton and some sodiers to capture the dinosaurs. "

Then the tiny guy from Zara's pocket tried to move, for being seen by Claire...But Zara put her hand on her pocket to keep
him in place.

" Anyway, as you don't care about anyone but yourself, i guess you don't care about what's gonna happen to these guys either ! "

Zara then quickly pointed the gun at the two soldiers, and shrunk them. When they realized what happenned, they started to shoot
at her, but it was useless of course. Claire was in shock...It seems that Zara stole the shrinking gun created by Hamilton...But she was also
surprised to see Zara acting like that...She was a kind and discreet personn..But now she was so different...

" Zara...What do you think you are doing ? You're gonna shrink me and step on us ?! Please Zara, that's not you..." Claire begged.

But Zara had other thing in mind...
121211.title: Claire was here with some soldiers !

choices: Zara want to eat him alive
Zara still use Claire
Reader choice
1212111.content:
" I have a better idea. Remove one of your heels ! " Zara said.

" What ?...Ok...." Claire replied. She realized that Zara didn't wear any shoes, but why would she need only one heel ?
She started to think that her assistant became crazy...


" Now take one of your soldier and put him inside your heel ! And you guys, you d'better not move if you don't want me to shrink you
more ! "

The tiny soldiers began to scream, telling Claire to not listen. But Claire couldn't see any other option...she didn't want to be shrunk too.

" Zara they didn't do anything to you, no matter if you blame me for something, but let them out of this ! " Claire tried to reason her.

" Just do it or i shrink you ! You choose one of them. Your own choice will change the fate of one of these guys ! "

Claire had to face a cruel dilemma, only for her own safe. It was horrible to say that, but Claire wouldn't sacrifice her size to save
two soldier she doesn't even know personnaly. So, she looked at one of the guy and bend down to pick him up.

" NO DONT LISTEN THIS BITCH !!! " he screamed and shoot at the giant hand coming to him, but it was hopeless."

" I'm sorry..." that's all Claire could say to him, as she was holding him tight for a phew seconds before dropping him inside her heel.

" Now put your foot in your heel.! " Zara said.

Claire obeyed. The tiny soldier didnt have time to get away as Claire's giant foot was coming for him, so he decided to run at the toe
section, maybe he could survive. And he was right, as Claire's toes couldn't go further in the heel. He felt relieved...He really thought
he was going to die.

But Claire then lifted her foot, keeping her heel on the ground, only to make the little soldier slid to the arch of her foot. Once she could feel him, she slammed down her whole foot on the ground, crushing him instantly.

" I didn't ask you to crush him Claire..." Zara giggled.

" What ? But why did you want me to put him in my heel ?! " She replied, panicked by what she just done for nothing.

" I thought he could have fun to be trapped with your giant foot. Or maybe not, who know ? At least it wouldn't be as cruel than being
trapped inside the stomach of a monster...."

" What are you talking about ?! Did you...?"

" You don't need to know ! There's one guy left. "

The last tiny soldier was too scared to move or even to think, after seeing his comrade died in a cruel way..

What's gonna happen to him ?
1212111.title: She forces Claire to have some fun with the sol...

choices: Claire refuses to let him go
She let him go
12121112.content:
" But first i need some shoes to wear, that's why i came in your office. Do you have some to
give me ? " Zara asked.

Claire then took a pair of heels near her desk. As she was used to work everyday and sometimes at night too, Claire
used to use her office as a second home and brought some clothes and shoes, just in case.

" Take these ones " She said.

" Oh no, you're gonna put them on my feet by yourself ! I don't want to let you an opportunity to take the gun
from me ! " Zara replied, and Claire obeys. She felt humiliated to have to do this, as she still considered Zara
as her assistant, but she needed to remain strong. She really didn't want things to get worse and being shrunk.

Once she's done, Zara felt better, and took a look at the tiny soldier scared.

" Now for this one, just put him in your shoe but DONT crush him this time ! " She ordered to her boss.

" Without any hesitation, Claire just listenned to her and picked the tiny soldier to place him quickly inside
her heel. Then she made sure to have him stuck in between her toes, so he wouldn't get crush by accident.

" And now what Zara ? " She asked, annoyed.

Zara didn't listen and pointed the gun at Claire, shooting at her. In less than 5 seconds Claire found herself shrunk to
the size of the unlucky soldier....But as he was in her heel, he shrunk with her so became so much more smaller.

" NOOOOOO !! I DID EVERYTHING YOU ASK !!!! WHY DID YOU DO THAT ?! " She screamed at her now giant assistant.

But Zara didn't feel the need to reply, and she just grabbed her boss in one hand, to put her inside her shoe...

" this is disgusting !!! let me gooooo !!! " Claire continued to scream, as she was now stuck her Zara's giant toes, with no light.

Zara giggled.

"Disgusting ? And what about the poor man you have in your own heel? How does he feel ? "

" I don't care !! Just let me go please Zara !!! " Claire's answer was cruel for the now microscopic (for Zara at least) soldier
trapped at her feet, but Zara wasn't surprised. This woman who was her boss before was just selfish. That's why also she didnt
feel any remorse to crush the first soldier, as Zara never asked for that.

Somehow, Zara felt sorry for the microscopic soldier, as she knew what it's like to being helpless, trapped in a place he could never
escape. But she also loved that...The feeling to have the power on an innocent people like him.

" You are free to. Just don't count on me to remove my foot from the heel you just gave me. Oh and by the way, i want you
to let him go too. He is free too... " she giggled as she tried to imagine his reaction when he will realize his new hopeless situation.
12121112.title: Zara still use Claire

choices: Claire submits to Zara, kneeling at her feet
She refuses, Zara smirks and shrinks her down to 'travel' size, then leaves
1212112.content:
'Oh I don't plan to step on you' Zara smiles, just before stomping on one of the soldiers, twisting her sole into the floor before stepping into the red head's personal space 'Instead, we're going to be changing quite a few things. You're not the boss anymore, now I AM! You will now be my assistant, though I suppose the more accurate description would be slave.'

Claire blinks 'You're serious?' she asks 'And what if I refuse?'

Zara grins wider 'Then instead of a slave you'll be my pet, and if you can't even do that you'll just become a snack' Zara licks Claire's cheek causing the woman to shiver 'At least you'd be a tasty little treat if we get that far' she muses, only then did Claire feel the size gun just below her ribs.

Claire swallows heavily 'Um, do I have time to make a decision?' she asks with a quiver in her voice

Zara clicks her tongue 'Yeah, I'll give you a few minutes....' she then caught something out the corner of her eye 'Actually... it appears I have a pest to deal with, when I'm done with him you will answer me' she explains before walking over to the escaping soldier, Claire trying not to look at the bloody marks she was leaving on the floor due to the other one she crushed minutes prior.

The ravenette easily catches up to the man, lightly kicking him to knock him off his feet. She then smirks down to him 'Well, well, trying to get away are you? That's not very nice' Zara tuts and raises her foot 'I could crush you right now you know' she muses and the man pales when he see's the mess that was left of her bare sole of his comrade, unrecognisable to anything human. There was a sigh of relief when she puts it down beside him, until she picks him up 'But this would be a lot more fun. It's odd how getting eaten by a mosasaur and surviving gives you such an apatite' she smiles widely as he screams, though she ignores it as she rips the uniform off of him before placing him in her mouth, swirling him around before biting down, the bones crunching like a nut as the rest squishes like soft fruit. Zara moans at the taste as she swallows, before turning on her heels and walking back over to Claire who had turned white as a sheet 'So my dear, have you made your decision?'

What does Claire choose?
1212112.title: Now she is the boss, not Claire

choices: Somedays later
121212.content:
Zara entered the room, there were no one. She then started to search in the room for some shoes
and luckily found a pair of Claire's heels near the desk. She put them on, and continued to search
for some informations.

" What are you looking for ? " Asked Hamilton from her pocket.

" I need to know where they are living..." She replied, while she was openning some drawers to look inside.

" Who ? "

But Zara didn't reply as she just found the folder she needed. A folder about Claire, her profile, skills, and her
family. Now she knew where her nephews Zach and Gray Mitchell were living. She was thinking about what to

info.brief_description: This is a shrink or growth story about Zara Young from Jurassic World. Please add !
info.description:
For those who don't know, Zara Young is a character from Jurassic World, interpreted by Katie McGrath.
Many people think that she had a cruel fate as an innocent character...But was she really innocent ?

The conception of my story is this :

First Option : Zara was not as innocent as we thought, and had a dark secret involving
tinies people she found and kept for herself. She used them and tortured for her own
pleasure...This way we could understand why she died in a sadistic way in JW :)


Second Option : Zara survived at the end of JW ( by vomitstting for example),
then she found herself alone in the park, traumatized. She then realized
that no one cared about her, or showed some consideration.
She found a shrinking / gowth gun in one of the abandoned labs. So she
decides to get her revenge on them, as she doesn't want to be kind anymore,
and she wants to have the full control of her life, and people's life.


RULES

1) Zara is the only Giantess. That involves also : no gorwing guy.
But for the Shrink part, Zara can use some tinies with her boyfriend Alex for sex

2) Zara doesn't shrink or find herself smaller than someone.

3) More than two lines by addition, unless you are offering another choice.

4) Not allowed : Ass / Toilets stuffs.

5) Allowed : almost everything else, as long as it respect the conception of Zara dominating
and humiliating people. Feet stuffs are truly appreciated.

6) She can kills people, but not the main characters from the movie.

7) Vore is truly appreciated for the second option of story, but also accepted in first option.
She can also eat dinosaurs.


Note : this is my first story, and i don't speak english very well, so please forgive me for my grammar. I won't
blame any of you for your gammar, but please make things understandable


Hope you'll have fun !
